name: ArmageddonandBeyond
0:
”Alexa, open armageddon an beyond”
”Alexa, ask armageddon an beyond for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start armageddon an beyond”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: armageddon an beyond
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to our booklet entitled "Armageddon and Beyond" by Mr Richard Ames.
For more information, visit our website at TomorrowsWorld.org
You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume."
Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day.
To start, say "Alexa, open Armageddon and Beyond".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
